org.persona.middleware.input
Class InputPublisher

java.lang.Object
  org.persona.middleware.input.InputPublisher
All Implemented Interfaces:
de.fhg.igd.ima.sodapop.BusMember, de.fhg.igd.ima.sodapop.Callee, de.fhg.igd.ima.sodapop.Publisher
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultInputPublisher
public abstract class InputPublisher
extends Object
implements de.fhg.igd.ima.sodapop.Publisher

Provides the interface to be implemented by input publishers together with shared code. Only instances of this class can publish input events.

Author:
mtazari
